Trade/Device Name(s): AMPLICOR CT/NG test for Neisseria gonorrhoeae
Roche Scripts for AMPLICOR CT/NG Test Accessory
Regulation Name(s): Neisseria species, Direct Serological Test Reagents
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AMPLICOR CT/NG test for Neisseria gonorrhoeae and Roche Scripts software accessory for automated specimen preparation using Tecan Genesis RSP 150 Workstation
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA in urine (males), endocervical swabs (females), and urethral swabs (males) via PCR and hybridization capture; automated sample preparation via Roche Scripts accessory is indicated only for swab specimens, not urine.
